name: Unusual investigator
description:
Managing

WSAD - control of character movement

J - open notepad 

N - noir mode 

Gameplay 

Noir mode moves your character back in time to the day the crime was committed, thanks to this mode you can understand what happened and why the victim died (only 3 times you can use this mode)

To complete the game, you need to specify the place of the crime, what the crime was committed and the motive of the crime. All of this can be specified in the notepad.

Exit the game is not Alt + F4 to help :)
